item.description:
Come meet fellow theatregoers....

Hi, as we kick off the 2009/10 theatre season, come out and meet other people who love the theatre!

We will gather at Trinity Brewhouse for a brew, appetizer, meal -- whatever you feel like. You pay for whatever you consume, conversation is free. Just ask at the hostess stand for the Theatre Meetup Group.

Afterward, there is a Meetup for the musical Cabaret at Trinity Rep, around the corner. If you plan to go, please see the Meetup posted on our site -- you need to prepay for tickets ($25) by Sept. 3.

Feel free to come just to the Meet & Greet, if you'd like.

Looking forward to seeing new and current members!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask at the hostess stand for the Theatre Meetup Group
item.name: Meet & Greet -- First Meetup of the season
